name: VIDEO GAME
description:
With simple one-button controls, anyone can pick up and play. Aim and shoot the ball past your opponent to score and dash to catch and return it quickly for a stronger shot. Fight your friend 1v1, or team up and battle in a frantic 2v2 match!Key Features
  • 1v1 or 2v2 matches!
Thrash your mate in a 1v1 match, or pass the ball to your teammate and work together in 2v2 matches!

  • Customisation!
Every player can choose a colour and face, adjust point values and play on one of 4 levels!

  • Music!
Two toe-tappingly Dope Tracks!
